// JAI HANUMAN 
#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	int t,l1,l2,i,j;
	string s1,s2;
	cin>>t;
	int k=1;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>l1>>l2;
		cin>>s1;
		cin>>s2;
		int dp[l1+1][l2+1];
		for(i=0;i<=l1;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<=l2;j++)
			{
				if(i==0||j==0)
				{
					dp[i][j]=0;
				}
				else if(s1[i-1]==s2[j-1])
				{
					dp[i][j]=1+dp[i-1][j-1];
				}
				else
				{
					dp[i][j]=max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1]);
				}
			}
		}
		
		cout<<"Case "<<k++<<": "<<dp[l1][l2]+(l1-dp[l1][l2])+(l2-dp[l1][l2])<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
